amendment.description: An amendment numbered 430 printed in Part B of House Report 116-413 to prohibit the President from using the authorized funds to detain undocumented immigrants in Department of Defense facilities.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 468).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A053) offered by Ms. Ocasio-Cortez.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ocasio-Cortez amendment (A053) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 468).
